title: Rakesh Jhunjhunwala picked 10 lakh shares of this housing finance company in Q4 - Business Today
content: Rakesh Jhunjhunwala picked 10 lakh shares of this housing finance company in Q4  Business Today
description: Big Bull held 60 lakh shares or 1.28 per cent stake in the firm in the last quarter against 50 lakh shares or 1.08 per cent stake in the December quarter of the previous fiscal.
